Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Fields
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    io.grpc.auth.ClientAuthInterceptor
    use MoreCallCredentials.from(Credentials) instead.
    io.grpc.netty.HandlerSettings
    renamed to InternalHandlerSettings and should not be used externally
    io.grpc.testing.StreamRecorder
    Not for public use
  • Deprecated Fields 
    Field and Description
    io.grpc.okhttp.OkHttpChannelBuilder.DEFAULT_CONNECTION_SPEC
    Deemed of little benefit and users weren't using it. Just define one yourself
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    io.grpc.Context.Storage.attach(Context)
    This is an old API that is no longer used.
    io.grpc.MethodDescriptor.create(MethodDescriptor.MethodType, String, MethodDescriptor.Marshaller<RequestT>, MethodDescriptor.Marshaller<ResponseT>)
    use MethodDescriptor.newBuilder().
    io.grpc.netty.NettyChannelBuilder.enableKeepAlive(boolean)
    Please use NettyChannelBuilder.keepAliveTime(long, java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit) and NettyChannelBuilder.keepAliveTimeout(long, java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit) instead
    io.grpc.okhttp.OkHttpChannelBuilder.enableKeepAlive(boolean)
    Use OkHttpChannelBuilder.keepAliveTime(long, java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit) instead
    io.grpc.netty.NettyChannelBuilder.enableKeepAlive(boolean, long, TimeUnit, long, TimeUnit)
    Please use NettyChannelBuilder.keepAliveTime(long, java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit) and NettyChannelBuilder.keepAliveTimeout(long, java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit) instead
    io.grpc.okhttp.OkHttpChannelBuilder.enableKeepAlive(boolean, long, TimeUnit, long, TimeUnit)
    Use OkHttpChannelBuilder.keepAliveTime(long, java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit) and OkHttpChannelBuilder.keepAliveTimeout(long, java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit) instead
    io.grpc.netty.GrpcHttp2ConnectionHandler.handleProtocolNegotiationCompleted(Attributes)
    Use the two argument method instead.
    io.grpc.Context.CancellableContext.isCurrent()
    This method violates some GRPC class encapsulation and should not be used. If you must know whether a Context is the current context, check whether it is the same object returned by Context.current().
    io.grpc.Attributes.keys()
    This method is being considered for removal, if you feel this method is needed please reach out on this Github issue: grpc-java/issues/1764.
    io.grpc.testing.TestUtils.loadX509Cert(String)
    Not for public use
    io.grpc.netty.NettyServerBuilder.maxMessageSize(int)
    Call NettyServerBuilder.maxInboundMessageSize(int) instead. This method will be removed in a future release.
    io.grpc.netty.NettyChannelBuilder.maxMessageSize(int)
    Use AbstractManagedChannelImplBuilder.maxInboundMessageSize instead
    io.grpc.Attributes.newBuilder(Attributes)
    Use Attributes.toBuilder() on the Attributes instance instead. This method will be removed in the future.
    io.grpc.ClientStreamTracer.Factory.newClientStreamTracer(Metadata)
    Override/call ClientStreamTracer.Factory.newClientStreamTracer(CallOptions, Metadata) instead.
    io.grpc.testing.TestUtils.newSslSocketFactoryForCa(Provider, File)
    Not for public use
    io.grpc.Attributes.Key.of(String)
    use Attributes.Key.create(java.lang.String) instead. This method will be removed in the future.
    io.grpc.CallOptions.Key.of(String, T)
    Use CallOptions.Key.create(java.lang.String) or CallOptions.Key.createWithDefault(java.lang.String, T) instead. This method will be removed.
    io.grpc.testing.TestUtils.preferredTestCiphers()
    Not for public use
    io.grpc.ServerStreamTracer.serverCallStarted(ServerCall<?, ?>)
    Implement ServerStreamTracer.serverCallStarted(ServerCallInfo) instead. This method will be removed in a future release of gRPC.
    io.grpc.ForwardingChannelBuilder.usePlaintext(boolean)
    use ForwardingChannelBuilder.usePlaintext() instead.
    io.grpc.ManagedChannelBuilder.usePlaintext(boolean)
    Use ManagedChannelBuilder.usePlaintext() instead.
    io.grpc.inprocess.InProcessChannelBuilder.usePlaintext(boolean)
    use InProcessChannelBuilder.usePlaintext() instead.
    io.grpc.netty.NettyChannelBuilder.usePlaintext(boolean)
    use NettyChannelBuilder.usePlaintext() instead.
    io.grpc.okhttp.OkHttpChannelBuilder.usePlaintext(boolean)
    use OkHttpChannelBuilder.usePlaintext() instead.
    io.grpc.stub.AbstractStub.withChannel(Channel)
